text: I commiserate with @nmanigeria over the death of Dr Emeka Chugbo and Dr Aliyu Yakubu. The deceased cases reinforce the need to intensify the supply of all necessities, including Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) to protect medical personnel. https://t.co/9QBErRByH6
